Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Ann M Wilson
Reviews.Content: Did not work straight out of the package. Tried several new batteries to no avail. Will have a very disappointed child on his birthday... Do NOT buy this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
4x digital zoom, High-definition, Anti-Shake, 9.1MP 3456 x 2592 resolution, SD card supported
9.1MP and a 1.8-inch preview screen
Pic Bridge ready with digital still camera mode
4x Digital Zoom with ant shake feature
Features face detection capability
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar 9.1MP Digital Camera with 1.8-Inch Screen (V9112-BLK-PR)
